site_title: Backwards Plane by Carlos Gonzalez Garcia

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: My 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge is where I try to find 100 different type of paper airplanes, ideally not so well known and show you how to fold them. I will be publishing a new video with a new paper plane every week. Here at Heap Art we are a Origami Channel. By subscribing, you will be receiving origami tutorials as well. Every Tuesday and Sunday I will show you how to fold something new and never seen on this channel. This is Paper plane 12 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It's the Backwards Plane by Carlos Gonzalez Garcia. When it flies, it gives the illusion that it is the traditional airplane flying backwards. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 011 : Concorde By Kunihiko Kasahara", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/6ZeeZc4nCsA Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to connect using origami. If you like origami and if you like paper airplanes, please remember to subscribe. I will be delivering something new to you every week. Use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 Thanks for watching.
